info.title: Harness Security Test Orchestration API
info.description: Read and manage Security Test results. This API is in beta and is liable to change until it reaches 1.0.0.

get.description:
Report usage

**Required security scopes for jwt**:
  * `core_account_view`

parameters.name: timestamp
parameters.description: Timestamp indicating the end of the usage interval (in milliseconds since Unix epoch)

get.description:
Report usage for all accounts

**Required security scopes for jwt**:
  * `sto_internal_use_only`

parameters.name: timestamp
parameters.description: Timestamp indicating the end of the usage interval (in milliseconds since Unix epoch)

delete.description:
Delete all account data

**Required security scopes for jwt**:
  * `sto_internal_use_only`

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: The ID of the account to delete data for

get.description:
List a collection of Exemptions

**Required security scopes for X-Api-Key**:
  * `sto_exemption_view`

**Required security scopes for jwt**:
  * `sto_exemption_view`

parameters.name: X-Api-Key
parameters.description: Harness personal or service access token

post.description:
Create a new Exemption

**Required security scopes for X-Api-Key**:
  * `sto_exemption_create`

**Required security scopes for jwt**:
  * `sto_exemption_create`

parameters.name: orgId
parameters.description: ID of the Harness Organization to which the exemption applies. Cannot be specified alongside "targetId".

parameters.name: projectId
parameters.description: ID of the Harness Project to which the exemption applies. You must also specify "orgId". Cannot be specified alongside "targetId".

parameters.name: X-Api-Key
parameters.description: Harness personal or service access token

get.description:
Find Exemption by ID

**Required security scopes for X-Api-Key**:
  * `sto_exemption_view`

**Required security scopes for jwt**:
  * `sto_exemption_view`

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: The ID of the Exemption to retrieve

parameters.name: X-Api-Key
parameters.description: Harness personal or service access token

put.description:
Update an existing Exemption

**Required security scopes for X-Api-Key**:
  * `sto_exemption_create`

**Required security scopes for jwt**:
  * `sto_exemption_create`

parameters.name: orgId
parameters.description: ID of the Harness Organization to which the exemption applies. Cannot be specified alongside "targetId".

parameters.name: projectId
parameters.description: ID of the Harness Project to which the exemption applies. You must also specify "orgId". Cannot be specified alongside "targetId".

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: The ID of the Exemption to update

parameters.name: X-Api-Key
parameters.description: Harness personal or service access token

delete.description:
Delete an existing Exemption

**Required security scopes for jwt**:
  * `sto_exemption_create`

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: The ID of the Exemption to delete

put.description:
Approve/reject an existing Exemption

**Required security scopes for X-Api-Key**:
  * `sto_exemption_approve`

**Required security scopes for jwt**:
  * `sto_exemption_approve`

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: The ID of the Exemption to update

parameters.name: action
parameters.description: The approval action to take on the Exemption

parameters.name: X-Api-Key
parameters.description: Harness personal or service access token

get.description:
Returns issue summaries that are going to expire

**Required security scopes for jwt**:
  * `sto_issue_view`

parameters.name: days
parameters.description: Number of days of Baseline Issue counts to return

get.description:
Returns counts of active Security Issues for one or more Pipeline Executions

**Required security scopes for jwt**:
  * `sto_issue_view`

parameters.name: executionIds
parameters.description: Comma-separated list of Harness Execution IDs for which to count Security Issues

get.description:
Returns a specific issue exemption

**Required security scopes for jwt**:
  * `sto_issue_view`

Provides baseline execution data needed by the Overview page

**Required security scopes for jwt**:
  * `sto_issue_view`

Provides historical issue data needed by the Overview page

**Required security scopes for jwt**:
  * `sto_issue_view`

parameters.description: Number of days of Baseline Issue counts to return

get.description:

  * `sto_exemption_view`

  * `sto_testtarget_view`

**Security Scopes**:
  * `sto_internal_use_only`: Internal Use Only
  * `core_account_view`: View Core Account
  * `sto_issue_view`: View Issues
  * `sto_issue_edit`: Edit Issues
  * `sto_issue_delete`: Delete Issues
  * `sto_scan_view`: View Scans
  * `sto_scan_edit`: Edit Scans
  * `sto_scan_delete`: Delete Scans
  * `sto_testtarget_view`: View Scan Targets
  * `sto_testtarget_edit`: Edit Scan Targets
  * `sto_testtarget_delete`: Delete Scan Targets
  * `sto_exemption_view`: View Exceptions
  * `sto_exemption_create`: Create Exceptions
  * `sto_exemption_approve`: Approve Exceptions
  * `sto_exemption_delete`: Delete Exceptions
  * `sto_products_view`: View Scan Tools
  * `sto_products_edit`: Edit Scan Tools
  * `sto_products_delete`: Delete Scan Tools
